docs.abstract: Palestinian Liberation Organization calls for a curtailing of longstanding security coordination with Israel; move, which will require authorization by Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas, comes as yet another escalation in cycle of retaliation between Israel and Palestinians.

docs.snippet: Lawmakers in several states are seeking to address the high-profile problem of sexual assaults on college campuses, but their bills have encountered criticism and legal complexities. Among the contentious measures, some are viewed as infringing on...
docs.lead_paragraph: Lawmakers in several states are seeking to address the high-profile problem of sexual assaults on college campuses, but their bills have encountered criticism and legal complexities. Among the contentious measures, some are viewed as infringing on victims' rights and others as too favorable to accused students.

headline.main: Problems Arise for State Efforts to Curb Campus Sex Assaults
